title: Harmless race condition in tutorial

3. docs/tutorial/database.rst: Discusses database schema. Update to make clear why UNIQUE constraint is important and how error handling works.
4. examples/tutorial/flaskr/schema.sql: Contains the UNIQUE constraint; may need comment or explanation to clarify for tutorial readers.
5. examples/tutorial/flaskr/db.py: If any changes to error handling or database connection logic are made, update this file and comments for consistency.'}
